comment.author: 22968943@N05
comment._content:
I think this is a glitch in the system - the image is not of a dam under construction, but seems to be of a dugout house - I seem to recall seeing a similar image from New Mexico perhaps ?

Now that the correct black-and-white is up, the above is simply for histerical porpoises :)

comment.author: 15204460@N07
comment._content: This is NOT the Shasta Dam area.  Vegetation indicates somplace more montain, eastern and drier.  The blooming vegetation is probably Rabbit Brush and I suspect the trees near the house are Pinion Pine or perhaps Lodgepole.  Anyway, it's someplace high and dry and nowhere near the Redding, California area.
